description:
[gtk] Add fade-commit to instant suggestion for predictive instant.

BUG=65399
TEST=manual

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=68395

messages.text:
http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc
File chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc#newcode64
chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc:64: const int kFadeInTimeMS = 300;
Is it possible or necessary to share these constants with other ports?

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc#newcode814
chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc:814: GdkColor c;
It's not used in views port.

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc#newcode854
chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc:854: void AutocompleteEditViewGtk::UpdateInstantViewColors() {
Please fix compilation failure for views port.

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/app/multi_animation.cc
File app/multi_animation.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/app/multi_animation.cc#newcode36
app/multi_animation.cc:36: current_value_ = 0;
current_value and current_parent_index should be set in SetStartTime. SetStartTime should probably be renamed to indicate its the place for this sort of resetting. Don't feel you need to rename SetStartTime as part of this patch.

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/app/multi_animation.h
File app/multi_animation.h (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/app/multi_animation.h#newcode51
app/multi_animation.h:51: void Reset();
If we want this, it should be in Animation.

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc
File chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc#newcode64
chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc:64: const int kFadeInTimeMS = 300;
On 2010/12/04 03:43:38, James Su wrote:
> Is it possible or necessary to share these constants with other ports?

Maybe move them to browser/defaults?

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/app/multi_animation.cc
File app/multi_animation.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/app/multi_animation.cc#newcode36
app/multi_animation.cc:36: current_value_ = 0;
On 2010/12/06 17:38:12, sky wrote:
> current_value and current_parent_index should be set in SetStartTime.
> SetStartTime should probably be renamed to indicate its the place for this sort
> of resetting. Don't feel you need to rename SetStartTime as part of this patch.

I think I've done what you intended

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/app/multi_animation.h

removed

http://codereview.chromium.org/5588004/diff/2001/chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc
File chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc (right):

chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc:64: const int kFadeInTimeMS = 300;
On 2010/12/06 17:38:12, sky wrote:
> On 2010/12/04 03:43:38, James Su wrote:
> > Is it possible or necessary to share these constants with other ports?
> 
> Maybe move them to browser/defaults?

moved to instant_controller. defaults.h doesn't seem to be a place for stuffing generic constants.

chrome/browser/autocomplete/autocomplete_edit_view_gtk.cc:814: GdkColor c;

> It's not used in views port.

Done.

Done.
